title: Scam jinx and Jinx Mafia

replies.body: Aw bummer dude, the same thing happened to my friend a few days ago, same scam.  He got his account back today but all the rp had been used up on gifting skins and all the ip gone too.  Let me know the state of the account when you get it back if you don't mind, I want to compare it with what happened to my friend and see if I can find anything.

Hey,

Thanks for reporting this.  I've removed the link from your post so that nobody accidentally clicks it.

Cheers
Mindstar
i clicked the link. i submitted a support ticket and changed my password. what else should i do?
